# üöÄ Copilot Quick Start Cheat Sheet

A one-page guide for new developers to use all 12 SaaS Copilot agents in real workflows. Copy/paste these commands in Copilot Chat to automate your development process.

---

## 1. General Issue Fixing

@saas-fixer scan workspace
@saas-fixer apply all safe fixes

## 2. Security & Compliance

@saas-security scan for vulnerabilities
@saas-security audit authentication system

## 3. Frontend (React/Next.js)

@saas-ui-fixer debug BillingModal component
@saas-ui-fixer fix issues in Dashboard.jsx

## 4. API Consistency

@saas-api-sync compare backend routes with frontend API client
@saas-api-sync fix mismatched API clients

## 5. Architecture & Structure

@saas-architect review folder structure
@saas-architect enforce naming conventions

## 6. Tests

@saas-tests create tests for BillingModal.jsx
@saas-tests update tests for userController.js

## 7. Documentation

@saas-docs update README.md with BillingModal usage
@saas-docs generate onboarding guide

## 8. DevOps / Pipelines

@saas-devops optimize Dockerfile
@saas-devops validate GitHub Actions CI

## 9. Database Migrations

@saas-migrations review pending migrations
@saas-migrations validate schema changes

## 10. Performance

@saas-performance scan for bottlenecks
@saas-performance optimize Dashboard.jsx

## 11. Release Automation

@saas-release generate changelog
@saas-release bump version

## 12. Error Handling

@saas-errors standardize error handling in backend services
@saas-errors audit logging in auth module

---

## üìù Example Workflow (Recipe)

1. Scan for issues: @saas-fixer scan workspace
2. Fix UI bugs: @saas-ui-fixer debug BillingModal component
3. Apply fixes: @saas-ui-fixer apply the suggested fix
4. Generate tests: @saas-tests create tests for BillingModal.jsx
5. Update docs: @saas-docs update README.md with BillingModal usage
6. Audit security: @saas-security audit BillingModal
7. Check performance: @saas-performance scan BillingModal.jsx
8. Review architecture: @saas-architect review folder structure
9. Validate migrations: @saas-migrations review pending migrations
10. Optimize DevOps: @saas-devops optimize Dockerfile
11. Prepare release: @saas-release generate changelog
12. Standardize errors: @saas-errors standardize error handling in backend services

Follow these steps for a complete, automated development workflow using Copilot agents.
